Title: Pu$$y Weed
Writer: Abbi Jacobson (created by), Ilana Glazer (created by), Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer
Actors: Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer, John Gemberling, Arturo Castro
Plot: The girls need to grow up! Abbi wants to buy her OWN weed, like a grown woman, while Ilana is finally tackling taxes by herself. Also, the girls are super, super-duper stoned.
